Checkout: Leave master branch at latest version, move working directory to specified commit

Reset: Move master and working directory.

GIT
git add -u: add modified files.

Clones repo into current directory: git clone repo_url
Check remote connections: git remote -v
Stage files for commiting: git add . #adds all changed/new files

Update chnages from original repo, put in new branch: git fetch upstream
Merge the upstream chnages to master on your local machine. Nos push them up if you want.
git merge upstream/master
Update local repo with master changes: git pull origin master
